name: IceCreamTruck
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ice cream truck
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this game, kids must manage an ice cream truck by determining how much ice cream to make and how much to sell it for!

About SayKid
SayKid combines voice technology with tangible play to help kids learn in an actively-engaging way - without screens! SayKid won the Grand Prize in the Amazon Alexa EdTech Challenge, has been recognized by Harvard, and was the subject of a recent TEDx Talk: “Can a Toy Transform Education?” Search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill store for additional learning experiences. We LOVE reviews!

For more screen-free educational experiences, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. 

We strive to give parents and educators tools to help kids learn - without screens! If you enjoyed this game, we’d be so grateful if you left us a review!

Awards
- Grand Prize in the Alexa EdTech Competition 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Competition
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize
priv:
